english.segment1: The pathway is broken. And The signs are unclear. And I don't know the reason why You brought me here. But just because You love me the way that You do. I'm gonna walk through the valley. If You want me to
english.segment2: Chorus: CauseI'm not who I was. When I took my first step. And I'm clinging to the promise You're not through with me yet. so if all of these trials bring me closer to you. Then I will go through the fire. If You want me to
english.segment3: It may not be the way I would have chosen. When you lead me through a world that's not my home. But You never said it would be easy. You only said I'd never go alone
english.segment4: So When the whole world turns against me. And I'm all by myself. And I can't hear You answer my cries for help. I'll remember the suffering Your love put You through. And I will go through the valley. If You want me to
